```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Read an external script:

```{r, include=FALSE, cache=FALSE}
knitr::read_chunk('test.R')
```

Now we can use the code, e.g.,

```{r, test-a, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
```
